metadata.name: Potential Reconnaissance Activity Via GatherNetworkInfo.VBS
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the built-in script located in "C:\Windows\System32\gatherNetworkInfo.vbs". Which can be used to gather information about the target machine

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\cscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wscript.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('cscript\\.exe', 'wscript\\.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gathernetworkinfo.vbs')))

output.summary: Detects execution of the built-in script located in "C:\Windows\System32\gatherNetworkInfo.vbs". Which can be used to gather information about the target machine
